summary: the iowa board of chiropractic released a report wednesday detailing charges against charles manuel , of lamoni . manuel signed an agreement last month admitting his misdeeds and pledging not to apply for reinstatement for at least 10 years . the agreement requires that manuel prove any circumstances surrounding the revocation of his license no longer exist before he can resume practicing chiropractic in the state .
